channel.title: [PI] item brainfart
channel.description:
were do I make it so when you click on an item, it makes something happen.
For example, clicking on a book opens an interface.
I know HOW to do it, just need to know what file and where. Thanks

item.title: [PI] item brainfart
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

[quote=“R3minice, post:13, topic:426260”][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=528951.msg3858898#msg3858898 date=1324535703]
no errors, but stil didnt work
[/quote]
What option did you click on for the book? If it’s the second one then try ItemClick2 or 3.[/quote]

I just click read (the first one)

public void info() { for(int i = 8144; i < 8214; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i); } c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Rampage X Info", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@-How To Make Money-", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Want to know how to make money? Well, hit the magic tab)", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@and teleport to and kill rock crabs (or any monster)", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@and loot them. Then go to the general store guy in edgville ", 8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@& sell it to him. From there use your money to obtain)", 8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Gear, weapons, and items. Aswell as food and potions.", 8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@-Pking/PvP-", 8153); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@PvP is very important on this server. Thats why ", 8154); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@why all the good gear costs @red@Credits.@blu@Basically", 8155); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@when you kill someone, you get 2 @blu@Credits. With those", 8156); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@credits, you can buy epic gear, and extreme potions from ", 8157); //c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::buyticket @red@(@red@Exchange 500m for a ticket@red@)", 8158); //c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::sellticket @red@(@red@Exchange one ticket for 500m@red@)", 8159); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@@red@Swag1nABag@blu@ at home.You can veiw your @red@Rampage Credits", 8158); c.getPA().sendFrame126("in the quest tab.", 8159); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@You also get credits by killing the boss @red@Doogan", 8160); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@the Wretched Skeleton. Hes multi-teamable but hes in the wildy.", 8161); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Hes also incredibly strong. Enter the portal at home to fight him.", 8162); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8163); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Auto-Casting and All that fun stuff works, so kick some ass.", 8164); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@If you have any questions, just ask at www.rxreloaded.tk", 8165); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8166); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@You can use curses (Turmoil etc.) by using the", 8167); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Chaos altar right by the wildy in edgeville (home).", 8168); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@You can also use lunars (Veng etc.) & Ancients", 8169); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@by activating the altars at home by the bank.", 8170); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8171); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@The website is www.rxreloaded.tk Please be sure", 8172); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ - Acrodox", 8173); }

ClickItem.java

if(itemId == itemID) { //Change itemID c.getPA().info(); }

item.title: [PI] item brainfart
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

sorry back.

heres my whole clickitem.java

http://pastebin.com/USQU1f8G

heres what i want to add “command version” to a book

if (playerCommand.startsWith("info")) { //change name to whatever, info, donate etc.
				c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
				c.flushOutStream();
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Rampage X Info", 8144);	
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@-How To Make Money-", 8146);	
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Want to know how to make money? Well, hit the magic tab)", 8147);			
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@and teleport to and kill rock crabs (or any monster)", 8148);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@and loot them. Then go to the general store guy in edgville ", 8149);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@& sell it to him. From there use your money to obtain)", 8150);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Gear, weapons, and items. Aswell as food and potions.", 8151);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@-Pking/PvP-", 8153);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@PvP is very important on this server. Thats why ", 8154);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@why all the good gear costs @red@Credits.@blu@Basically", 8155);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@when you kill someone, you get 2 @blu@Credits. With those", 8156);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@credits, you can buy epic gear, and extreme potions from ", 8157);
				//c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::buyticket @red@(@red@Exchange 500m for a ticket@red@)", 8158);
				//c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::sellticket @red@(@red@Exchange one ticket for 500m@red@)", 8159);

				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@You also get credits by killing the boss @red@Doogan", 8160);

				c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8166);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@You can use curses (Turmoil etc.) by using the", 8167);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Chaos altar right by the wildy in edgeville (home).", 8168);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@You can also use lunars (Veng etc.) & Ancients", 8169);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@by activating the altars at home by the bank.", 8170);	
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8171);

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

case 122:
UseItem();
break;


void UseItem() {
		itemId = playerItems[ItemSlot] - 1;
		int ItemId = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
		int ItemSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
	if (itemId != -1) {
		switch(ItemId) {

	case 385:
								
	//itemhere
	break;

		}
	}
}

Don’t say a word about conventions.
